item.title: Why is Canaan Cursed Rather than Ham?
item.description: The text does not give us enough details to know exactly why, but I think there are a few things we can conclude from the passage: Part of the reason some readers take issue with this passage is that they think Ham is getting off without punishment for his offense. The punishment that fell to Canaan, however, would have felt like a punishment to Ham as well. His line was not blessed and one of his sons was cursed.
